name: Regulate
description:
A universe... 

It's filled up with garbage asteroids. 

Planets have spaceships to destroy them.

But they are not using attack ships. Nobody knows why. 

And they need some objects. These objects can be found in neighbor planets.

But they are not going for taking them too!

This universe needs an organizator. Wonder who can make things right here...

Maybe you can?

This game made in 72 hours for HUJAM'22 and all content used in this game are free or paid assets. Read UsedAssets.txt for detailed info.
